main: Her S3's Base and Coin Power changes depending on her number of stacks. At 0-3, it's 15 +4. At 4-6, it's 17 +6. At 7, it's 30 +10. It also changes its atk weight to the value of her stacks, but she loses 5 SP per stack above 1 and if her SP hits 10 or lower, she has a 50% chance to attack indiscriminately. This means at 7 stacks, she needs to be at 41 or above SP for her not to attack indiscriminately. It will also consume all her {status:FreischutzShotCount} if she uses it at 7 stacks. This counts as 'spending' her last ammo for any relevant passives from other identities.

Her skills also inflict {status:DarkFlame} (1 from S1, and equal to her {status:FreischutzShotCount} stacks for S2 and S3), which inflicts {status:DefenseDown} and {keyword:Pride} damage based on {status:Combustion} Potency depending on the stacks of {status:DarkFlame}.
other: Her passive gives her {status:Breath} before attacking based on the enemy's {status:Combustion} if they have 4 or more {status:DefenseDown}.
{ego:21108} interacts with her mechanics, generating {status:FreischutzShotCount} based on Reson and inflicting {status:DarkFlame}.

1110701.desc: If the main target's Defense Level is currently lowered by 4 or more, gain ([Combustion] on main target/2) [Breath] Before Attack (Max 20 per turn)
1110701.name: The Marksman's Smoking Pipe

data.desc:
Deal +0.5% damage for every [Combustion] on target (Max 15%)

[BeforeAttack] Gain 1 [FreischutzShotCount]
- Lose (([FreischutzShotCount] -1)x5) SP
- Atk Weight becomes equal to [FreischutzShotCount] value
- At 10 or less SP, 50% chance to attack indiscriminately

[EndSkill] If at 7 [FreischutzShotCount], reset to 0 (Counts as spending the last Ammo)
